text: Mark of Khorne||A unit with the [[b]][[col:white]]Mark of Khorne[[/col]][[/b]] has:\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]][[img:icon_frenzy]][[/img]] Frenzy Passive Ability\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_resistance_magic]][[/img]] Spell Resistance\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_armour]][[/img]] Armour\\n[[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]] Reduced [[img:icon_melee_defence]][[/img]] Melee Defence
